name: a04-tamerosman3
description: This assignment will help you stand up a web API using Express and the module that you produced for a03.

scripts.test: PORT="$(shuf -i 2000-65535 -n 1)"; (timeout --signal=SIGINT 5 node server.js --port=$PORT; exit 0) & sleep 1s && curl -s http://localhost:${PORT}/app/roll/ && sleep 5s

author: tamerosman3
